item.title: Resolutions for 2015
item.description:
Now that it is February, time to make some goals for myself in 2015.

1.) Be an even awesomer Husband & Father 2.) Make a blog 3.) Read 2 books a month 4.) 1 Blog post a month 5.) Re-Implement this blog using: a.) rails b.) django c.) elixir d.) go & its magnificent stdlib
